cab.content: Telegram from the High Commissioner for Iraq tothe Secretary of State for the Colonies. (Circulated by the Secretary of State for the Colonies).Ro: 719., Your telegram 27o; 578. Treaty signed to-day October 10th corresponding tonineteenth Saf ar.. Wording of announcement gave completesatisfaction-. On seeing it Pel sal after ashing me torealise what difficulty mandate question had placed, him inmade protestations of utmost gratitude; swore most solemnOath of unswerving loyalty to his undertakings and friend-ship with Great Britain, expressed earnest hope that he was now restored to the complete confidence of His !majesty'sGovernment and myself. As soon as signature of Treaty is known there will heclamour for its publication... I trust therefore that therewill be as little delay as possible. I await your announce- ment of date of publication.secret AS I IT E , T .CP. 4274.IRAQ,. TREATY.October 10th, 19 22.(Sd)COX.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.,wVlo October 12th, 1922,
